data: Education for All Foundation is an institution.
Education for All Foundation operates within the education and nonprofit industries.
Education for All Foundation is dedicated to providing quality educational resources to underprivileged communities worldwide.
Education for All Foundation partners with local schools to equip students with books, technology, and trained teachers.
Education for All Foundation programs have benefited over 200,000 children in Africa and Asia.
Education for All Foundation is based in New York, NY.
